players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "I believe Alice was innocent. Bob revealed a mafioso, which means he could be lying to protect himself."
Bob: "I am the detective and I revealed Alice as the mafioso. Charlie believes Alice was innocent, which means he thinks Bob is the mafioso. We need to investigate Bob next."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
